idea-plugin.name: BrowseWordAtCaret
idea-plugin.description:
1. Allows to easily browse next/previous word at caret.
2. Highlight other appearances of selected word.
3. Copy/Cut effects to word at caret (if nothing seleceted)
4. New EditorAction 'PasteReplace' to paste and replace word at caret.

Keys:
- Browse with [CTRL]&[ALT]&[UP]/[DOWN] (note: on default-keymap this shortcut is also for next/previous occurrence).
- PasteReplace with [ALT]&[V].
